value: okay people who are trying to fight the
Peel District School Board listen up on
Twitter there's a guy called Brian
woodland and he's going back and forth
back and forth with the parents of Peel
District School Board I think is the
name of the group going over and over
this duty to accommodate and they're
just having a big long drawn-out
circular argument repetitive stuff and
it's going nowhere but something
happened today again quite by
coincidence I saw a post by the parents
of Peel District School Board saying
saying about the duty to accommodate and
I put this is ludicrous you can't
possibly accommodate all the different
religions you have to it would have to
accommodate all or none this guy Brian
woodland answered and he said our key
facts detailed duty to accommodate you
can disagree but Duty is real and then
he links me to the Peale school board
rules about accommodation and I said
okay thank you that's interesting this
is the way forward then and he came back
and he said you think vexatious requests
to hard-working school staff is the
right approach you will annoy us into
abandoning the law did you get that he
just said if the school board gets
enough requests from enough parents to
accommodate all these different things
they will annoy them into abandoning the
law so to me this is the way forward
Brian woodland has just handed you the
weapon so use it because I will tell you
and as you know already that is part of
the strategy of these splinter groups
and um is using the same technique they
use the existing laws rules regulations
and social pressures to their advantage
so I'm telling you this is the way stop
arguing about whether it's morally right
or wrong or what Islam actually means
and what they're saying in Arabic that
is gonna get you nowhere what you have
to do is take this man's advice he might
not have meant
give me this advice because as soon as I
said oh thank you Brian I see I see the
way forward now he blocked me which is
funny because if you look I gonna put on
the screen if you look when I click on
his profile if you look at his little
thing that says you're safe with me or
whatever and then right beside it says
you are blocked from seeing this account
I only had those two back and forth
Swift mr. woodland and neither which
neither of which were confrontational
so either mr. woodland is nervous about
what he just said to me and me sort of
realizing what it can be used for or
it's possible that this whole time mr.
woodland is trying to tell people this
is how you can fight this fight I'm
gonna try to get attention on this I'm
probably gonna look up this duty to
accommodate and then I'm gonna learn
about the different religions and what
things I could find that people of those
religions can bring to the school and
say hey look we want fish on Fridays or
whatever it may be whatever it may be
now you will get maybe accused of it
being vexatious because you'd never
asked for it before and all of a sudden
you're asking for it now but people
nobody knew about this until now nobody
knew they could even ask for the
accommodation and the fact of the matter
is the school board is not gonna get
into trying to determine which parent is
being quote vexatious at which parent is
being sincere they're not gonna have
time to do that what they're going to do
is they're gonna look at the overall
mass of requests and they're going to
have to decide do we accommodate all of
these or do we accommodate none of these
and guess which one they're gonna pick
so that's my advice peace out
you
